title: Is immunotherapy effective for late-stage lung cancer?
author: Patient
question: I want to understand how immunotherapy works and if it is recommended for stage 4 lung cancer.
reply: Immunotherapy can be effective depending on biomarkers like PD-L1 expression. A researcher would consider multiple clinical factors.

title: Am I eligible for Glioblastoma trials?
author: Patient
question: I was recently diagnosed with Glioblastoma. How do I know if I qualify for any global clinical trials?
reply: Eligibility depends on age, genetic markers, and prior treatments. Trial coordinators typically evaluate patients individually.
